body_html: @JackWindows You can also try to reproduce the issue in the preview nightly (conda installation can be found at https://pytorch.org/). When you are certain that you have the issue, can you just replace with your model & training logic (I suppose that is the part that can't be shared) with some standard/dummy training and try to craft a small script?

body: @JackWindows You can also try to reproduce the issue in the preview nightly (conda installation can be found at https://pytorch.org/). When you are certain that you have the issue, can you just replace with your model & training logic (I suppose that is the part that can't be shared) with some standard/dummy training and try to craft a small script?
